title: Application for National ID Card (First time)
description: Apply for first time National ID
requirements: Birth certificate, parent's IDs (or next of kin), school leaving certificate (if available)

title: Replacement/Duplicate of National ID Card
description: Replace lost or damaged ID card
requirements: Copy of old ID or ID number, police abstract (if lost), payment fee

title: Application for a New Birth Certificate
requirements: Birth notification slip, parents' IDs, hospital/local authority confirmation

title: Application for a Death Certificate
requirements: Death notification form (signed by doctor/local authority), ID of deceased/informant

title: Passport Application (New/Renewal)
requirements: Original birth certificate/copy, Original National ID/copy (adults), Duly filled online Form 19, copies of parents' IDs (for minors)

title: KRA PIN Registration (Individual)
requirements: National ID card details, Employer's PIN (if employed), Business registration certificate (if applicable)

title: Filing Individual Tax Returns
requirements: KRA PIN and iTax password, P9 form (for employees), relevant financial records

title: Application for Tax Compliance Certificate (TCC)
requirements: Compliance with all tax obligations (verified on iTax)

title: Police Clearance Certificate (Good Conduct)
requirements: Original National ID card, Printed C24 fingerprint form and invoices, fingerprints taken at DCI office

title: Driving License Renewal
requirements: eCitizen account, KRA PIN, Valid ID card

title: Provisional Driving License Application (PDL)
requirements: ID card details, KRA PIN, passport-size photo

title: Motor Vehicle Registration
requirements: Import entry documents (if imported), KRA PIN, ID, NTSA account details

title: Transfer of Vehicle Ownership
requirements: Logbook details, buyer/seller KRA PINs, IDs of involved parties, payment of transfer fees

title: Business Name Registration
requirements: Proposed business name, description of activities, IDs and KRA PINs for proprietors, passport photos, physical address

title: Filing Annual Returns for Businesses
requirements: Business registration number, up-to-date business details, KRA PIN, payment fee

title: Student Loan Application
requirements: National ID card, KRA PIN, University/College admission letter/student ID

title: Member Registration (NSSF)
requirements: National ID card details, KRA PIN, employer details (if applicable)

title: Member Registration (NHIF)
requirements: National ID card, passport photos, KRA PIN, marriage certificate (if adding spouse)

title: Official Land Search
requirements: Title deed number or land reference number, copy of ID card, KRA PIN

title: Booking a Driving Test
requirements: PDL details, vehicle details for test, payment receipt
